documents_dashboard_document_ID_PL: Photocopy of the front and back of your proof of identity (passport, national ID card).
documents_dashboard_document_PROOF_OF_AD: Proof of address with your full name and address, as indicated in your profile, dated within the last 3 months (bank statement, utility bill, etc.)
documents_dashboard_document_CORPORATE_I: A copy of the company’s certificate of incorporation or tax clearance certificate of any company linked to the address indicated on your profile, dated within the last 3 months.
documents_dashboard_document_ADMINISTRAT: certificate of incorporation corresponding to the company’s activity.
documents_dashboard_document_ASSOCIATION: Certificate of incorporation corresponding to the company’s activity.
documents_dashboard_document_individual_: Useful documents containing information about your circumstances (e.g., residential address, change of address)
documents_dashboard_document_corporation: To facilitate the validation process, please attach high quality scanned documents (black and white photocopies and files from external sharing services are not accepted).
documents_dashboard_document_association: To facilitate the validation process, please attach high quality scanned documents (black and white photocopies and files from external sharing services are not accepted).
documents_dashboard_document_administrat: To facilitate the validation process, please attach high quality scanned documents (black and white photocopies and files from external sharing services are not accepted).
documents_dashboard_document_other_OTHER: Useful documents containing information about your circumstances (residential address, change of address)
